questions.question_text: Which of the following is NOT a valid maturity level of the Software Capability Maturity Model (CMM)?
Which of the following statements is related with the second law of OPSEC?

discussion.content:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Operations_security
1. What i need to protect 2, Against what threat

choices.C: If you don't know about your security resources you could not protect your network.
choices.B: If you don't know what to protect, how do you know you are protecting it?
choices.D: If you don't know the threat, how do you know what to protect?
choices.A: If you are not protecting it (the critical and sensitive information), the adversary wins!
